melfice

patent activation popup does not give any problems. if you are annoyed...

[x] Go to "C:\Program Files>Common Files>Nero>Shared>NL3"
[x] Delete the file "NeroPatentActivation.exe"

This does not work with 8.1.1.0 they caught on to it....

patent activation popup does not give any problems. if you are annoyed...
